{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10182v1", "title": "Explicit cluster multiplication formulas for the quantum cluster algebra
  of type $A_2^{(1)}$", "summary": "Let $Q$ be an affine quiver of type $A_2^{(1)}$. We explicitly construct the
cluster multiplication formulas for the quantum cluster algebra of $Q$ with
principal coefficients. As applications, we obtain: (1)\ an exact expression
for every quantum cluster variable as a polynomial in terms of the quantum
cluster variables in clusters which are one-step mutations from the initial
cluster; (2)\ an explicit bar-invariant positive $\mathbb{ZP}$-basis.", "main_category": "math.QA", "categories": "math.QA,math.RT", "published": "2025-04-14T12:35:08Z"}
